alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued February 21 at 3:17PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Watch * WHERE... CAIC Forecast Zone of Aspen and Gunnison. * WHEN... Very dangerous avalanche conditions are expected to develop by Tuesday afternoon and last through at least Wednesday. * IMPACTS... Heavy snow and strong winds will result in natural avalanches. Large human-triggered avalanches are likely as new snow accumulates. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Monitor Colorado.gov/avalanche for changing conditions. Plan ahead for avalanche conditions to become very dangerous, and to avoid travel in avalanche terrain by late Tuesday afternoon. JK

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
